reviews.review: игра параша 500 руб я на них 3 месяца проживус
10/10 game. Real fun and scary at times with semi balanced game play.
Very fun, been playing for years
good
kill

30時間の初心者からの視点
ゲーム自体は本当に楽しいと思う。
マッチ画面で相手のランクが見えるようになればまだ遊ぼうかなって気は起きる。
キラーは個々の能力が全く練習できないのもストレス。
キラー専属で遊んでいるが、上位ランクは確実に煽りしかいないから、
頑張ろうって考えるより切断するかどうかしか考えなくなる。

問題は
１、日中はキラーがマッチしない、鯖はマッチするけど放置キラーがほとんど
２，夜間はキラーはマッチするけど、赤とかの上位としかマッチせず上位者は略100%煽ってくる
３，DLCが無いとキラーやる場合はパークの問題で発電機が早すぎてゲームにならない。

The community is horrible.

Es un buen juego con buena optimización, pero si algo de lo que debería quejarme seria que mejoren los servidores en Latinoamerica. Lo positivo es que tiene variedad de killers y supervivientes, aquí quiero recalcar que algunos son de PAGA así que no te enojes si ves a un personaje nerfeado por el mapa bajando superviviente de un solo toque..... sin embargo esto no limita la diversion si lo juegas tanto en solo o con amigos.

u shit ur pants 
but good game

(Надо было давно написать про Dead by Daylight) кмм... Игра супер похожа на пятницу 13 НО НО НО!!!!! это не то. А то щас начнут голдеть тип дбд лучше этой параши, ну так вот она прикольная каждый раз обновы всё время подвозят, маны другие, перки топовые, и многое другое самое то когда ты идёшь в пати и разносишь мана либо на оборот, вас но потом споришь кто виноват, но в основном игра для спокойных а для бомбящих. 10/10

Es un buen juego... muy dificil de balancear, dado que el killer está demasiado OVERPOWERED...

Hay partidas en las que el Killer te puede agarrar, colgar y quedarse mirandote todo el tiempo para que saques 0 puntos....

Hay partidas en las que el Killer ayuda a los Survivors a sacar puntos, y viceversa (las mejores partidas)

Hay partidas en las que el Killer es malo o es bueno... y ahí se hace competitiva la cosa...

Pueden tocarte Survivors copados, pueden tocarte Survivors que no ayudan...

Pero bueno, a pesar de todo esto, es entretenido, y muy divertido de jugar con amigos

Si vas a jugar solo, jugá Killer, pero NO seas ese Killer HDP que campea o tunelea gente... La re calcada CTM
Nice Co-op game. Run away from Killer. Repair Generator and Heal Friend Help each other to escape

Back with another 40+ Hour review
Let's get started shall we?
Survivors: 8/10. The designs and the survivors from the crossover events have great designs and respect the crossovers a lot
Killers: 9/10. The Designs on each killer is unique especially their powers. They are really well made
Game play: 7/10. There are a lot of bugs needing ironed out and a lot of other things but it's good otherwise 
Music: 10/10. Each theme is unique especially the chase music, menu, etc. It's well composed 
Maps: 10/10 Each map is made unique for each killer.
Overall a solid 9/10

EDIT (Update 6.0.0)
As update 6.0.0 approached I was starting to get back into the game and began my new ritual of playing a killer for a month to get a feel with how they work. Now we have Roots of Dread including Haddie and the new killer Dredge. I am personally LOVING the feeling of Dredge, so I'd say update 6.0.0 is a good one and with the future updates coming with Bots in custom games, a lot of perk reworks, and MMR tests. I'd say BHVR is moving DBD onto the right track! Of course it ain't perfect still, due to all the hackers that plague the game, and those Bully squads that exist to bring nothing but toxicity and pain to the community. Also the fact there ain't more than Core and Customs in the game is a bit disappointing I hope in the future we'll have new game modes like Competitive, or 2 v 8 or something.

pallete veryfunni

I have been playing this game for over 4 years now mainly on Xbox. I have about 1500 hours rounded up I believe which may not be much for 4 years to most people, but to me this is my most played game by a long shot. I don't even know what it is with this game that carries on bringing me back to it, but I can say that I really do love it. Trust me this game has given me a lot of pain especially with certain unplayable updates that really just put me down from the game in the past, but I always come back for more and more and Dead By Daylight has been my favourite multiplayer game for a while now. I've met so many friends and amazing people from this game alone and I may say a lot of shit towards this game in my own time a lot, but it really is a game that has peaked my interest through all of these years!

I still believe that this game doesn't really help new players that much as there is a big learning curve for most as this game isn't just another FPS game shilled out 20 times a year, but if your thinking of giving this game a go I couldn't recommend it more, just know that u will want to break your keyboard at least 3 times week while playing it :)

Помню давным давно, ещё на старте попробовал и как-то не зашло. Плюс кажется, что геймплея то на пару часов, тк из механик только саные моторчики, которые чинятся одной и той же кутэешкой. И что Вы думаете? Катаю сейчас просто как мразь, тк просто засосало и дикий фан получаю. А ещё хочется ВСЕ ДЛС! Это наверное единственный минус, тк не просто скины,а  геймплейные куски и механики продают за валюту. А в остальном просто балдеешь!
